item.title: Save $900 on Sony’s Best Mirrorless Camera With This Early Black Friday Deal (2025)
item.description: Sony’s top-of-the-line A7R V mirrorless camera is at the lowest price it’s ever been, and so is the more video-friendly A7 IV.

item.title: The Destruction of a Notorious Myanmar Scam Compound Appears to Have Been ‘Performative’
item.description: Myanmar’s military has been blowing up parts of the KK Park scam compound. Experts say the actions are likely for show.
